Package de.lessvoid.coregl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoreElementVBO
    The CoreElementVBO class represents a VBO bound to GL_ELEMENT_BUFFER.
    CoreFactory  
    CoreFBO
    Helper class to use a frame buffer object.
    CoreLogger
    Basic logging functionality for coregl-utils library classes; wraps a java.util.logging.Logger and provides basic support for high-performance, SLF4J-like string concatenation.
    CoreRender
    Simple helper methods to render vertex arrays.
    CoreScreenshot
    This is not really OpenGL core profile specific.
    CoreShader
    Helper class that represents a shader (actually the combination of a vertex and a fragment shader - what GL actually calls a program).
    CoreShaderManager
    Helper class to manage CoreShaders (programs).
    CoreTexture2D
    The CoreTexture2D represents a 2D texture in OpenGL space.
    CoreTextureBuffer
    CoreTextureBuffer - texture buffer support (work in progress)
    CoreUBO  
    CoreVAO
    A Vertex Array Object (VAO).
    CoreVBO<T extends Buffer>
    The CoreArrayVBO class represents a VBO bound to GL_ARRAY_BUFFER.
    CoreVersion
    Version enumeration and identification for OpenGL and GLSL.
    UniformBlockInfo  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColorFormat
    This enumerator contains the default settings for different color values the texture could be stored as.
    CoreVAO.FloatType  
    CoreVAO.IntType  
    CoreVBO.DataType  
    CoreVBO.UsageType
    Type of the VBO.
    CoreVersion.GLSLVersion
    Version enumeration for the OpenGL Shading Language
    CoreVersion.GLVersion
    Version enumeration for the OpenGL library.
    ResizeFilter
    Image resizing mode.
    Type  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CoreGLException
    This is the exception thrown by the classes of the CoreGL library in case something goes wrong badly.
